storyInfo: Jessica wants to learn more about Vouivre after reading a novel that takes place there, and only Liskarm is familiar with the present situation in the country. To her surprise, Liskarm is far more than just 'familiar' with the happenings there.

attributes.content: What of... my tribe...?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Right, and I apologize if I shouldn't have asked.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh, it's nothing special. Is there something about us you wanted to know?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yes, actually, I have been doing some... research.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Something that has to do with my tribe?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I don't remember us ever having all that much to do with anyone though...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I could probably count all the mercenaries and merchants that passed through our land before I left on just one hand, and let's not even mention those tribes that intentionally stayed away from the rest of us.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What I want to know is what life was like for you outside the Vouivre Alliance's territory.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: There is very little literature on the subject, and given how chaotic everything is, it's not easy to get to the bottom of everything with each and every tribe...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's just as you said before. These tribes are practically isolated from the rest of the world.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I don't really mind.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But why are you interested in this?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: All I can think of is the endless desert, the dry weather, and the hunger there... and the survival techniques I learned just to survive.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I thought I might find these things helpful.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I mean no harm.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm just doing some investigation into everything that has to do with the Vouivre Alliance.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Are you thinking about going back to Vouivre?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I-I'm not planning on it. At least not right now.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: In the future, though...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Anyway, tell me about the kind of food that your tribe eats, how you cook and train, and what your husbandry techniques are like.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry! I didn't mean to bump into you. Did that hurt...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's okay. I don't get hurt very easily.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh? Jessica!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, hey there... Vanilla.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are you busy with something?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's nothing that important. I'm just...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm going to Liskarm's to return a book I borrowed from her.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A book?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'm so jealous. Both you and Liskarm have read a lot of books, right?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Reading so many words at once is still kinda difficult for me...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What kind of book did you read, Jessica?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's about Vouivre.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Vouivre? What about Vouivre?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, could it be one of those old classics, like the 'Vouivre Agricultural Techniques'—?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Sorry to rain on your parade, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's a romance novel that takes place during the Vouivre War.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A romance novel... about the Vouivre?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The flames of war rage... as the battles come to a standstill...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: During this time of chaos when all the mercenary groups are vying for dominance, the female lead charges into her lover's mercenary unit all by herself just to ask for his captain's permission for them to elope...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Is this a true story? Which mercenary group is that—
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's probably just loosely based on real life... I guess.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Well, that's odd. Most people's impression of the Vouivre is that they're all big mercenary lunks.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Here I thought no one would be interested in stories about Vouivre.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Haha... I think it's a pretty good book.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: After reading it, I kind of want to visit Vouivre, if I ever get the chance.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Vanilla, what should I do if I get to visit?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You want to visit Vouivre?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Is that... weird?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If you want to know what it's like to live in hell, I could be your bodyguard there and take you around.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I-Is it that bad?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Where I used to live, the people haven't even heard of things like toilets, bathrooms, and kitchens. The whole place's just an endless desert.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Ugh... I'm not sure I could get by there...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh, but Liskarm's from an Alliance-controlled area. That might be closer to the stuff you read about in the book.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Well, unlike where I used to live, the enemy there isn't nature itself. They contend with the even greater chaos of society there.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The Alliance's territory is more chaotic than the outside...? That's not something they ever talk about in the book.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Honestly, I don't really know what it's like in there.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Liskarm asked me about life back home before, and when we started talking about it, she said it wasn't all that peaceful of a place.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I spent most of my childhood with my tribe, and it was always a struggle between life and death, but I did get to live pretty free, aside from all that.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But the adults also told me that Vouivre was a mess.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hmm... I don't really know much more, so maybe you should go ask Liskarm.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: She just asked me not too long ago how life was with my tribe, too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh? Really?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sure she could explain Vouivre much better than me.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That romance part, though...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Tell me more about that next time.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'd be glad to, if you're interested.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (I'm so curious about Vouivre right now because of the book.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (But... I really didn't know that's how Vanilla saw the place.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (It sounds much worse than the book makes it out to be.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (What about Liskarm? I wonder what she thinks of her homeland...)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Excuse me, Liskarm? It's Jessica.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Liskarm?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm here. Come in.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm drying my hair. Wait there for a moment.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (Whoa... Compared to the last time I was here, there's so many books.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (So many reports, too.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (Liskarm's not just amazing in battle. She's also so knowledgeable. Plus, she's always so serious...)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hm? What's this report here...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: 'A Survey of the Popularity and Reputation of Mercenary Groups within the Vouivre Alliance?'
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And this. 'On the Tribes of the Vouivre Region...' I found it...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What did you find?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Eep! I-I'm sorry, Liskarm. I shouldn't have looked...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Phew—I was just taking a shower after training.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Did you need something from me, Jessica? If I remember correctly...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I... I'm here to return the novel I borrowed from you.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Just leave it on the table. I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Huh? This book...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I-Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No... I'm probably just mistaken...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If you borrowed it from me and you're bringing it back now, it's not an issue.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Whimper*... Thanks, Liskarm.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Something on your mind, Jessica...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I... Yeah...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Now, don't be so reserved. Take a seat.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: This isn't Blacksteel. You don't need to try to be so polite around me.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We are friends, aren't we?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Liskarm...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I see... So you don't trust me...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: O-Of course I trust you. O-Okay...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You haven't changed at all, Jessica.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm trying my best...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's a tough side to you, and unlike before, you know how to bring that part of you out now.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But well...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You freak out whenever you're scared. That hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Whimpers*... You make fun of me just like Franka does now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh, no, I'm not as much of a meanie as her.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Right... No, I mean... That's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Franka isn't really that much of a meanie, but she always pranks the rest of us all of a sudden—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: —And her jokes are terrible.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ahem... Okay, I'll try not to badmouth her. You wouldn't know how to respond otherwise.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So, was there something on my shelf that caught your eye just now?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, I guess it wasn't a book that I was interested in... It's more like Vouivre itself that I'm trying to know more about.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Vouivre?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: After I finished the novel, I wanted to know more about the story's setting.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You've been looking into Vouivre and the organizations there, right?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hm? How'd you know?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sorry, I... I saw the report on your desk just now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And I also heard...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Well... These reports aren't really anything that special.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's just... a habit of mine.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I was born in Vouivre, after all.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It wasn't until I'd left that I started to understand what a difficult situation my homeland is in... and what that actually meant for people outside.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But there is nothing I can do about the status quo.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: All I can do is to understand what is going on there to the best of my ability and to think about what I might do about it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I remember now. You told me before at Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That Vouivre needs a PMC that's different than the other ones.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Thinking back... I must've been so rash and naive for even coming up with that idea.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I-I think it's great to be ambitious!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I mean, it was you who plucked me out of the Equipment Department and asked me to join your team.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It was only because of your advice that I came here to Rhodes Island. I wouldn't have changed so much otherwise.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Back there, I didn't have any friends I could open up to, not to mention dreams.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I've always been very thankful of you, Liskarm. J-Just like How Franka found Vanilla—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Franka actually looked at all the recruits to find Vanilla.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: All I did was run a few searches on the Blacksteel roster. That's all it took to find you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You have such amazing potential. It was a waste for you to work in Equipment Testing.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: All those days gone by... They're all some really great memories... Yeah.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Looking back, I was just far too naive.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I thought I could start my own PMC as soon as I figured out the way Blacksteel operates.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: For the past few years, all I've ever paid attention to was Blacksteel's expansion.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If that was your goal all along, why did you go to the Biochemistry Department?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I had a few bottlenecks...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's all pretty clear to me in hindsight, but everything was just a haze to me back then.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The things that Blacksteel asked of me just didn't seem to be anything like the 'peace' I had in mind. I was always hesitating during my missions.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That contradiction tormented me. If Dr. Longfellow hadn't assigned me to Biochemistry, I probably would still be tormenting myself.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Jessica... We've been working in Rhodes Island for a while now. What do you think of this place?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I-I feel honored to be here!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I get to keep working with you and Franka, and I've changed a lot ever since I got here.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Back at Blacksteel, I just didn't have any friends I could open up to.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But I have a lot of friends here who will hear me out... and I've gotten a lot of help from everyone.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I think coming to Rhodes Island has got to be one of the most important things that ever happened to me!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yeah... That's good.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What about you, Liskarm? That reminds me. You and Franka were the first two Blacksteel employees who came to Rhodes Island, right?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A-Ahem.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Right. Back then...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You two just left without saying a word. I was so nervous.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I was so worried you were abandoning us.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It wasn't until later that I heard you were transferred to Rhodes Island with Franka.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Well, what else could I have done? She was my one and only partner...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Besides, I just didn't understand how Blacksteel did things back then. I was perhaps even more confused than you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And I'd shelved my goals for a good while too.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You don't mean... that Blacksteel has some dark secrets...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I think Blacksteel is a good company.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's just... I guess I started seeing things differently at some point.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I thought Blacksteel had a different philosophy than the other mercenary groups out there, and I thought that was the best way to unite all the disorganized mercenaries in Vouivre, to fix the way they live.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yet reality and my beliefs are two separate matters. My principles and actions don't always line up with each other either.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I... I think so too...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Blacksteel's operations help maintain the peace where it operates, but that peace is on the surface only.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It wasn't until I came to Rhodes Island that I understood things can actually be far grimmer.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's also why I never talk about those ideas I had anymore. They're way too foolish.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Rather than a security company that focuses only on opportunities, I think it's far more important to focus on your personal mission and responsibility.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Jessica, have you heard that, though deadlocked, Vouivre is still at war, and how it is completely disorganized?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I heard some stories about it before, but now that I've finished this book...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I want to learn more about Vouivre.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I used to think that perhaps the people out there just didn't know how to help Vouivre out of the hole it's found itself in.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It wasn't until I'd left and joined Blacksteel that I realized hardly anyone even knew how hard life was in Vouivre, or should I say... no one cared.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But I still wanted to make my homeland a safe place to life.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I want to make it a place where people from Vouivre would want to go back. I want to bring everyone together, to turn it into a place that can defend itself even without the PMCs outside.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I heard you babble about how Vouivre needs a security company to bring it peace while you were drunk one time. Is this what that was all about...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That was just drunk talk!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I just started putting together these data on Vouivre not too long ago...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: G-Gathering intel is just a habit of mine. It's got nothing to do with ambitions or whatever!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So don't make fun of me...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I wouldn't! I am sure you can accomplish anything you set your mind to.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: From the moment I first met you, I've never seen you slack off, whether it was back in Blacksteel or here in Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Although you've been drinking with Franka a lot more ever since you came here.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's all her fault.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She said she was going to fix how deadpan I was, and this was the way she went about it...!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But I think you live a much more fulfilling life now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You smile a lot more too.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I think... Franka changed you for the better...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: She may have become infected, but she's still trying to make her life more delightful.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She's serious when it's time to be serious, and she enjoys life whenever it's the right time to.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If we were still at Blacksteel, she wouldn't have that luxury. Blacksteel doesn't give its Infected members that kind of treatment...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And don't even ask if they'd let us stay together as partners.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Even though Franka got infected, she was still able to think about how to live her life to the fullest.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: On the other hand, I... I'm nothing compared to her.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But haven't you already found your goal, Liskarm?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You want to go back home, and to bring peace and change to Vouivre.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I know you'd definitely give it a lot more thought than me. I-I'm sure of it!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm... still not strong enough.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I don't have a clear goal like Franka does.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I still don't have the slightest clue what I'd have to do to start a new organization and run the whole shop myself.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Even so, I know it's definitely possible to bring change to Vouivre with the power I have.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I really think so.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm sure it is!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Vanilla told me that Vouivre has lots of special dances and food, and even though life may be pretty simple for the tribes in the outskirts... they are all very hopeful about the future.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Looks like you're getting all hyped up about Vouivre again.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, I mean... both the story and the protagonist are really special in this book.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sure stories that take place in Vouivre will become more and more popular.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I... I even want to pay Vouivre a visit, actually. Just once.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Of course... If I have time, I could take you around and be your bodyguard.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Not even you too, Liskarm... *Whimpers*... Is Vouivre such a scary place?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Right now? It's way too dangerous.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Coming across bandits is the least of your worries. If you found yourself caught in a fight between the mercenaries there...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: T-That's a little...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That being said, Vouivre will become a place that's worth paying a visit, Jessica.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: When that happens, you won't need a bodyguard. You'll be able to travel through the countryside, the wilderness, and the cities freely.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And to make that happen...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Yawns*... Hey, Liskarm, you there?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Who told you to just come in without knocking—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What'cha writing?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't just go looking at my report.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hm? What's this? A novel?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't just start rummaging through my bookshelf either.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: 'Vouivre Love...' Oh, isn't this—
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I knew it. This is yours.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Isn't this the romance novel I left in your room?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So you really didn't care for it, huh...?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's such an emotional story. Kinda makes me want to start a book club about it.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So you never so much as opened it after I lent it to you?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Jessica borrowed it from me the other day, and she just returned it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, I'll talk to Jessica about it, then. I'm never recommending books to you ever again, you party pooper.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hmph, it's just a made up story. There's no reason to read it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You know, this is the hottest romance epic among girls right now, and it's one of the few stories out there that takes place in Vouivre.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I guess it's kinda weird to have someone from Vouivre read a Columbian novel about Vouivre, but still.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I actually wouldn't mind hearing you criticize how different the book is from the real life over there.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Well, I can tell you at the very least that your favorite part, the part where they keep sending letters to each other, is never going to happen there.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: But well... After she finished the book, Jessica now knows a lot of the places and names there.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She's also very curious about Vouivre now. Even borrowed quite a few of my research reports.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That's the kind of power that novels have.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yeah, I guess I could research it from a cultural perspective.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You know, you really aren't a romantic at all.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We just aren't interested in the same genres.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If you'd brought me some sci-fi...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That's got no romance in it at all.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's weaponry and equipment research! Anything wrong with that?!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: A-Anyway, did you need me for something?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hm... What was it again?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Just kidding.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We got a new mission. Mutant Originium Slugs.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I was kinda thinking I could just take this mission on by myself or not tell you at all, and you'd be so mad.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So how about it? Wanna come join me on the hunt?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: (Breathes in)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (Breathes out)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I just finished this report.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alrighty then.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Well—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Let's get going already.
attributes.name: Liskarm
